attributes.additional_details:
Every year animals and people are put under unnecessary stress and danger due to fireworks. 
Both Domestic and wild animals suffer at the hands of fireworks. knowing when displays are happening is much easier to control and allows time to prepare and give medication where necessary.Horses and livestock when frightened and under stress not only pose a danger to themselves but those around them the ones trying to calm them and help them. Ontop of this people with disabilities such as autism suffer
attributes.background:
Ban the sale/purchase of fireworks for domestic use. 
Ban the use of fire works that are not part of an organised display.
Take into account all the accidents that happen with fireworks each year due to negligence and the trigger they cause to our veterans with PTSD.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
